headline: Deputy SAC at US Department of Homeland Security

positions.description: Assistant Special Agent in Charge of the Minnesota Division, within HSI St. Paul. I lead three operational law enforcement groups, as well as the SAC Intelligence Prorgam. I have oversight of investigations covering intellectual property, national security, document and benefit fraud, counter-proliferation, smuggling, child porn and child endangerment, human trafficking, transnational gangs and narcotics.
positions.title: Assistant Special Agent in Charge

positions.description: Unit Chief in charge of the Compliance Enforcement Unit, within the ICE HQ National Security Investigations Division. I developed and refined national ICE procedures and policy with regard to student visa violators, visa waiver overstays and the Alien Flight School Program. I managed a staff of two section chiefs, 13 national program managers and 42 intelligence analysts.
positions.title: Unit Chief

positions.description: Conducted investigations involving smuggling, fraud and immigration violators within the legacy U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service. As a Senior Special Agent, I was assigned to The Joint Terrorism Task Force and was assigned as a "Tiger Team" investigator at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
positions.title: Senior Special Agent

positions.description: Immigration Inspector at O'Hare International Airport.
positions.title: Inspector

positions.description: Military Police Sergeant with tours in Southern Germany, Ft. Knox, Kentucky,Frankfurt, Germany, Saudi Arabia, Iraq and Kuwait.
positions.title: Sergeant
